import React, {useState, useEffect} from "react" import {getOneUser} from "../../api/user" import Header from "../headers/header" import HeaderPages from "../headers/headerPages" import Footer from "../footer" import AdminMenu from "../../components/adminMenu" import contactIcon from "../../assets/icons/email-blue.svg" import { Button } from '@material-ui/core'; import TextField from '@material-ui/core/TextField'; import FormHelperText from '@material-ui/core/FormHelperText'; import FormControl from '@material-ui/core/FormControl'; const AdminUserEdit = (props) => { const [headerTitle, setHeaderTitle] = useState("Administration") const [headerBreadcrumbs, setHeaderBreadcrumbs] = useState([{value: "Accueil", link:"/"}, {value:"Administration", link:"/admin"}, {value: "Utilisateurs", link:"/admin/users"}, {value: "Edition", link:null}]) const [firstName, setFirstName] = useState("") const [firstNameError, setFirstNameError] = useState(false) const [firstNameErrorText, setFirstNameErrorText] = useState("") const [lastName, setLastName] = useState("") const [lastNameError, setLastNameError] = useState(false) const [lastNameErrorText, setLastNameErrorText] = useState("") const [email, setEmail] = useState("") const [emailError, setEmailError] = useState("") const [emailErrorText, setEmailErrorText] = useState("") const [password, setPassword] = useState("") const [passwordError, setPasswordError] = useState(false) const [passwordErrorText, setPasswordErrorText] = useState("") const [phone, setPhone] = useState("") const [phoneError, setPhoneError] = useState(false) const [phoneErrorText, setPhoneErrorText] = useState("") const [address, setAddress] = useState("") const [zip, setZip] = useState("") const [city, setCity] = useState("") // RegEx de vérification du mail let emailRegEx = /^[a-z]+([\.\-_]?[a-z0-9]+)*@([a-z]{3,})+(\.[a-z]{2,3})+$/ // RegEx de vérification du Téléphone let phoneRegEx = /^(?:(?:\+|00)33|0)\s*[1-9](?:[\s.-]*\d{2}){4}$/ useEffect(() => { getOneUser(props.match.params.id) .then((user) => console.log(user)) }, []) return(

Edition d'un utilisateur

Contact

{setEmail(e.target.value)}} error={emailError} type="email" value={email}/> {emailErrorText} {setPhone(e.target.value)}} /> {phoneErrorText} {setAddress(e.target.value)}} /> {setZip(e.target.value)}} /> {setCity(e.target.value)}} />

Informations personnelles

{setLastName(e.target.value)}} error={lastNameError} /> {lastNameErrorText} {setFirstName(e.target.value)}} error={firstNameError} value={firstName}/> {firstNameErrorText} {setPassword(e.target.value)}} error={passwordError} type="password" value={password}/> {passwordErrorText}
) } export default AdminUserEdit
